project_descr: Right to Education Programme supports the recovery of the educational sector in Gaza through reconstructing, rehabilitating and building back better what was destroyed during the 2014 hostilities on Gaza in addition to e-work and mental health.

outputs.output_descr: Targeted rehabilitation, reconstruction and expansion of education and higher education institutions, ensuring energy efficient, safe and child friendly spaces, to be complemented by support to mental health and employability enhancement services.
donor_name: Education Above All Foundation-Al Fakhoora Programme

outputs.output_descr: Periodic Maintenance of governmental schools in Gaza strip project, it contains rehabilitation and maintenance of six governmental schools to be maintained during three years.

project_title: right to education in the gaza strip
